tabs.label: auto

widgets.label: ^download
widgets.onValue:
storage.setItem("store_follow_1", get("follow_1"))
storage.setItem("store_follow_2", get("follow_2"))
storage.setItem("store_follow_3", get("follow_3"))
storage.setItem("store_follow_4", get("follow_4"))
storage.setItem("store_sel_fxCtrl", get("sel_fxCtrl"))
storage.setItem("store_fxCtrl_target", get("fxCtrl_target"))

widgets.label: ^upload
widgets.onValue:
set("follow_1", storage.getItem("store_follow_1"))
set("follow_2", storage.getItem("store_follow_2"))
set("follow_3", storage.getItem("store_follow_3"))
set("follow_4", storage.getItem("store_follow_4"))
set("sel_fxCtrl", storage.getItem("store_sel_fxCtrl"))
set("fxCtrl_target", storage.getItem("store_fxCtrl_target"))

widgets.html:
ReaperControl - OSC controller template for Reaper digital audio workstation

Setup Reaper:
1. add a new OSC control surface in Reaper preferences 
2. configure ports according to the settings in Open Stage Control
3. if Open Stage Control runs on the same machine, use 127.0.0.1 as Device IP
4. select Pattern config "Default"
5. check "Allow binding messages to Reaper actions and FX learn"

ReaperControl Custom Module:
Control selected fx parameters with your Midi controller (e.g. Midi Fighter Twister).
1. Load ReaperControl_CustomModule into OSC launcher
2. set your Midi controller to CC 0-15, Encoder mode: absolute
3. Add your Midi controller to OSC launcher as "FXCtrl"

ReaperControl & CSI
1. Setup CSI
2. select Pattern config "ReaperOSC - CSI"
3. select "Reaper OSC" or "CSI" for FX Control in ReaperControl setup

mj/2023

widgets.label: FX
widgets.onValue:
send(false, "/action/40769", 1)
send(false, "/action/_BR_FOCUS_TRACKS", 1)
send(false, "/track/@{parent.variables.n}/select", 1)
send(false, "/device/track/select/@{parent.variables.n}", 1)
set('display_fx_panel', 1)

set('selTrkFX', 0)
set('fxParBankSel', 0)

widgets.label: ^chevron-left
widgets.onValue:
send(false, "/action/40769", 1)
send(false, "/action/_BR_FOCUS_TRACKS", 1)
send(false, "/device/track/-", 1)
send(false, "/track/select", 1)

set('selTrkFX', 0)
set('fxParBankSel', 0)

widgets.label: ^chevron-right
widgets.onValue:
send(false, "/action/40769", 1)
send(false, "/action/_BR_FOCUS_TRACKS", 1)
send(false, "/device/track/+", 1)
send(false, "/track/select", 1)

set('selTrkFX', 0)
set('fxParBankSel', 0)

send(false, "/device/track/count/12", 1)
send(false, "/device/send/count/4", 1)
send(false, "/device/receive/count/4", 1)
send(false, "/device/fx/count/6", 1)
send(false, "/device/fxparam/count/16", 1)
send(false, "/device/fxinstparam/count/16", 1)
send(false, "/device/marker/count/20", 1)
send(false, "/device/region/count/20", 1)
send(false, "/action/41743", 1)

set('recall', 1)

widgets.label: ^upload
